articles.title: About
articles.contents:
Two Points Make a Line
          
          
          Home
          About
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            About
          
          
            
              
              
              
              The Plotting Cats by Issa
              Cruz
              
              
              Hello! My name is Ken.
              
              I work a lot with data, which means I often engage in
              the fun, frustrating, highly consequential—yet frequently
              dismissed!—art of data visualization.
              Two Points Make a Line documents my journey in
              mastering this art. I share my thoughts on what makes a
              chart work and what doesn’t, the tools I use, and the
              jambalaya of tidbits I learn along the way. Enjoy!
              
            
            
              
              
              
              The Plotting Cats by Issa
